840.quoteText: To ensure that disputes are dealt with soon after they arise, you agree that regardless of any statute or law to the contrary, any claim or cause of action you might have arising out of or related to use of our services or these Terms of Use must be filed within the applicable statute of limitations or, if earlier, one (1) year after the pertinent facts underlying such claim or cause of action could have been discovered with reasonable diligence (or be forever barred).
840.title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

tosdr.case: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
tosdr.tldr: If users have an issue with the terms of use, they must take action within one year.

We are strongly committed to not sharing nonpublic information and Personal Information with third parties.
